name: 2022 International Conference on Creative Industry and Knowledge Economy
content: The 2022 International Conference on Creative Industry and Knowledge Economy ( CIKE 2022 ) will be held in Qingdao from March 25th-27th, 2022\. Focusing on the emerging research field of Creative Industry and Knowledge Economy, the conference will provide an international platform for experts, professors, scholars and engineers from colleges and universities, scientific research institutes and enterprises and institutions at home and abroad to share professional experience, expand professional networks, face-to-face exchange of new ideas and display research results, discuss the key challenges and research directions faced by the development of this field, with a view to promoting the development and application of theories and technologies in this field in Colleges and enterprises, establishing business or research contacts for participants, and looking for global partners in future career.
